minecraft:written_book_content.title: Consequences
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Unknown
pages:
You travelled far and wide. You reached the stronghold. You lit the portal, forgotten for aeons. And now, you’ve slain a great beast.

Why?

Why did you kill it?

Why did you come here?

You don’t understand where you are, or what you did. Yet, entirely unprovoked, you came here.

You killed a dragon.

You say you’ve freed the end.

What were you freeing?

What were you freeing them from?
What was so wrong?

You made a mistake.

You don’t understand.

You shouldn’t have come here.

There will be consequences.
